programme.title: 60 Minutes
programme.desc: The oldest and most-watched newsmagazine on television gets the real story on America's most prevalent issues. CBS News correspondents contribute segments to each hourlong episode. Topics range from hard news coverage to politics, lifestyle, pop culture, business, health, and science. The correspondents and contributors include Lesley Stahl, Scott Pelley, Anderson Cooper, Bill Whitaker, Sharyn Alfonsi, Jon Wertheim and Norah O'Donnell .

programme.title: 60 Minutes
programme.desc: The oldest and most-watched newsmagazine on television gets the real story on America's most prevalent issues. CBS News correspondents contribute segments to each hourlong episode. Topics range from hard news coverage to politics, lifestyle, pop culture, business, health, and science. The correspondents and contributors include Lesley Stahl, Scott Pelley, Anderson Cooper, Bill Whitaker, Sharyn Alfonsi, Jon Wertheim and Norah O'Donnell .

programme.title: CBS Weekend News
programme.desc: Journalist Adriana Diaz anchors the Saturday edition of the CBS news program from Chicago, while Jericka Duncan takes the helm of the Sunday broadcast from New York. The two are the latest to fill the roll of weekend anchor, which was most recently represented by Reena Ninan and Eliane Quijano. The program offers the latest headlines, original reporting and in-depth pieces that add context and perspective to the world's events.

programme.title: Face the Nation
programme.desc: "Face the Nation," which is one of the longest-running news programs on the air, offers insight and analysis on the top issues of the day. Moderator Margaret Brennan welcomes politicians, government leaders and international newsmakers to a roundtable discussion of current events with CBS News correspondents.

programme.title: CBS News Roundup
programme.desc: The headlines one needs to know overnight... plus, a roundup of MoneyWatch, health, consumer and up-to-the-minute technology news, the latest weather, and inspiring stories of kindness and hope.

programme.title: CBS News Mornings
programme.desc: CBS News Mornings broadcasts on weekdays and offers viewers up-to-date news, comprehensive weather forecasts, and highlights from the world of sports.

programme.title: CBS Morning News
programme.desc: This half-hour early weekday broadcast features breaking news stories, sports scores and weather forecasts, updated for different times zones across the United States. Former anchors of the newscast include Charles Osgood, Meredith Vieira and Julie Chen.

programme.title: CBS Mornings
programme.desc: Hosts Gayle King, Tony Dokoupil and Nate Burleson set out to unite CBS' morning landscape with their lively and original reporting on international news stories during the weekday program's first hour, while expanding on feature reporting during the second hour with live interviews as well as in-depth pieces, covering topics from news, sports, climate and technology to race, health, parenting and personal finance. The team broadcasts from a new state-of-the-art studio in New York's Times Square.

programme.title: CBS Mornings Plus
programme.desc: "CBS Mornings Plus" is produced by the award-winning "CBS Mornings" team and takes viewers deeper into the most important headlines of the day, as well as pop culture, entertainment, health, wellness and financial news.

programme.title: CBS News 24/7
programme.desc: Coverage, reporting and storytelling from CBS News and Stations; a look at how news coverage comes together.

programme.title: The Takeout with Major Garrett
programme.desc: The Takeout is a new spin on the widely acclaimed podcast hosted by Major Garrett; a daily streaming show that harnesses the best of CBS News' political reporting and lives comfortably in deep discussions.

programme.title: The Daily Report
programme.desc: The Daily Report on CBS News features original interviews and insights on the most important, urgent and interesting stories of the day.

programme.title: CBS Evening News Plus
programme.desc: John Dickerson will guide viewers through the most impactful and important news of the day using in-depth conversations with CBS News journalists and contributors, as well as original reporting on national issues.

programme.title: CBS News 24/7 Primetime
programme.desc: 24/7 Primetime is your essential daily guide to all the stories shaping your world. Anchored by CBS News' Elizabeth Cook, the show delivers the news you need to know.
